articles.description: Malachi Flynn scored a career high 30 points and Washington State rallied late to defeat Colorado 73-69 on Thursday night to end a seven-game losing streak.
articles.headline: Washington St defeats Colorado 73-69 behind Flynn's 30

articles.description: No. 16 Rhode Island has a school-record 16-game winning streak, but there is cause for concern with the left knee injury suffered by fifth-year senior guard E.C. Matthews on Tuesday in a victory over Richmond.
articles.headline: Rhode Island-St. Bonaventure Preview

articles.description: Gibson Johnson and Sheriff Drammeh scored 13 apiece and Michael Thomas hit four free throws in the final 41 seconds to help Hawaii cool off UC Irvine 62-61 on Thursday night, ending the Anteaters' five-game win streak.
articles.headline: Hawaii outlasts UC Irvine 62-61

articles.description: Senior center Thomas Welch had 15 points and a career-high 17 rebounds and Aaron Holiday had 17 points and 10 assists to lead UCLA to a 75-68 victory over Oregon State on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Welch, Holiday lead UCLA past Oregon State 75-68

articles.description: Ryan Richardson scored eight of his 27 points in overtime and Weber State defeated Portland State 95-86 on Thursday night for its eighth straight win.
articles.headline: Richardson has 27, Weber St tops Portland St 95-86 in OT

articles.description: An Arizona cheerleader yelled into his megaphone while Arizona State's Remy Martin was shooting free throws, leading Pac-12 official Randy McCall to eject the cheerleader midway through the second half of Thursday's game.
articles.headline: Arizona cheerleader ejected for yelling into megaphone during free throws
